articles.content: Handset maker Tecno has introduced its artificial intelligence (AI) assistant, Ella-GPT, for the Camon 30 series. To recall, Tecno unveiled the Camon 30 and Camon 30 Premier 5G smartphones in India l… [+2055 chars]
